thread.title: PACK & SEND Australia reviewed by Paul Bucknall
thread.title_full: PACK & SEND Australia reviewed by Paul Bucknall

author: Paul Bucknall
title: PACK & SEND Australia reviewed by Paul Bucknall
text:
This is the second time I've used Pack & Send after recently discovering them.
Sent a birthday parcel from Newcastle to Lismore for my niece that arrived in about 36 hours and was $14 less than what Auspost Quote: d.
In addition to that my Sister was very impressed with the follow up call from the courier and that the parcel was delivered to her door. She lives 30 minutes out of Lismore and this is the first package in memory that she recalls being delivered to her door as the property is pretty hard to find.
Very impressed with this service!
